Summary: Round Orange Orb flying from West to East, no sound
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Batavia
There were no other sightings in Batavia on or around July 29th 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsLast evening, my husband and I took our dog out as usual before bed. As I do most nights, I walked out of our garage and looked up at the sky. To the west, I saw an orange round object coming across the sky from the west heading toward the east. It flew in a straight line. I asked my husband "What is that?" After about 10 seconds, he replied "I have no idea". The object moved across the sky at about the same speed as a passenger jet that we see often. We moved onto our front lawn to watch it until after about a minute, it just seemed to disappear in the night sky. We thought at first it might be a jet on fire. When it kept traveling in a straight line, we knew it couldn't have been. Within a few minutes, in the western sky, we saw an object falling at a fast rate of speed that was white, moving from South to North and disappearing. This round object was leaving a contrail behind it. Needless to say, it was an interesting few minutes.
